entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
